title: Ghana Income Tax And SSNIT Calculator

api_list.name: Income Tax And SSNIT Deductions Calculator
api_list.description: This endpoint will calculate and return the Ghanaian income tax and SSNIT Deductions.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ghana-income-tax-and-ssnit-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/calcincometax"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ghana-income-tax-and-ssnit-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ghana-income-tax-and-ssnit-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/calcincometax"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ghana-income-tax-and-ssnit-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
